A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Luck has no fight scene only a projection where he does nothing and dies. There is no light to light saber fights in the whole movie\, just a fight with the Snoke’s guards. And that wasn’t much of a lightsaber to lightsaber fight. It was lightsaber vs guards with they’re own type of lame weapons. Leia flies and looks pretty lame. The entire movie the First Order is chasing the Resistance till they run out of fuel. JJ did a much better job with The Force Awakens.
